Package com.financial.entries

Class PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetExpense
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense
public class PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense extends PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
Represents an expenditure within the National segment of the Public Investment Budget.

This class extends PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense to manage projects funded solely by domestic resources. It mirrors the structure of the co-funded segment while maintaining an independent registry and specialized logic for national budget modifications.

  • Field Details

    • pibNationalExpenses

      protected static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense> pibNationalExpenses

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense(String entityCode, String entityName, String serviceCode, String serviceName, String code, String description, String type, String category, long amount)
      **Initializes** a new National investment expense and **registers** it in the global registry.

      This constructor delegates the initialization of shared attributes to the parent class and automatically adds the instance to the static pibNationalExpenses registry to facilitate global aggregation and lookup services.

      Parameters:
      entityCode - **Unique identifier** for the Ministry or government Entity.
      entityName - **Display name** of the Entity.
      serviceCode - **Unique identifier** for the specific Service or Department.
      serviceName - **Display name** of the Service.
      code - **Budget classification code** assigned to this entry.
      description - **Textual summary** describing the expenditure.
      type - **Investment segment type** (e.g., "ΕΘΝΙΚΟ").
      category - **Broad classification category** for budget reporting.
      amount - **Monetary value** of the expense as a long.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpenses

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense> getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpenses()
      **Returns** the complete static registry of all **national** investment expenses.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all recorded national expenditure instances.

    • getPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpensesOfEntityWithCode

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense> getPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpensesOfEntityWithCode(String entityCode)
      **Filters** the national registry to find expenses related to a specific **Entity**.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - The unique code for the Ministry or Entity.
      Returns:
      A list of national expenses for the given entity.

    • getPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpensesOfCategoryWithCode

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense> getPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpensesOfCategoryWithCode(String expenseCode)
      **Retrieves** all national expenses assigned to a specific **Expense Category**.
      Parameters:
      expenseCode - The unique code of the budget category.
      Returns:
      A list of matching national expense entries.

    • findPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpenseWithCodes

      public static PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense findPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpenseWithCodes(String entityCode, String serviceCode, String expenseCode)
      **Performs** a unique lookup for a national expense based on Entity, Service, and Category codes.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - Unique Entity identifier.
      serviceCode - Unique Service identifier.
      expenseCode - Unique Expense Category identifier.
      Returns:
      The specific PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense record.

    • calculateSum

      public static long calculateSum()
      **Computes** the total aggregated sum of all expenditures in the **national investment** segment.
      Returns:
      The total sum of national investment projects.

    • getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentNationalExpenseCategory

      public static Map<String,Long> getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentNationalExpenseCategory()
      **Aggregates** expenditure totals for every **Category** within the national segment.
      Returns:
      A Map mapping category codes to their total financial sums.

    • getDescriptionWithCode

      public static String getDescriptionWithCode(String code)
      **Looks up** the descriptive text associated with a classification code.
      Parameters:
      code - The budget classification code.
      Returns:
      The textual description of the code.

    • implementGlobalChangesInCertainPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalCategory

      public static void implementGlobalChangesInCertainPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalCategory(String code, double percentage, long fixedAmount)
      **Implements** financial adjustments for a **target category** in the national segment. **Guarantees** data auditability by logging the state in ExpensesHistory first.
      Parameters:
      code - The target category code.
      percentage - The percentage shift to apply.
      fixedAmount - The fixed monetary shift to apply.

    • implementGlobalChangesInAllPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalCategories

      public static void implementGlobalChangesInAllPublicInvestmentBudgetNationalCategories(double percentage, long fixedAmount)
      **Executes** a global financial update across **all national categories**. **Persists** the current data state in history to allow for future auditing.
      Parameters:
      percentage - The global percentage adjustment.
      fixedAmount - The global fixed amount adjustment.
